thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 8 of 472
thread.title: Carrie

author: Carrie
title: Carrie
text:
The website is easy to use, and Clearbags offers a wide selection of products. When some items I ordered were unavailable, someone called to let me know. When I called customer service, the rep was very helpful in finding substitutes, and they turned out to be fine. My only suggestion is that it would have been helpful if the first caller left a phone number! I wasn't sure which office to call back.
I find shipping is pricey, so I try and be careful to order everything I might need at once.
